data-types.data-type: A time stamp (defined as xsd:dateTime in GPX 1.1) for an individual geographic point.

spec.title: GPX 1.1
spec.desc: GPX (the GPS Exchange Format) is a light-weight XML data format for the interchange of GPS data (waypoints, routes, and tracks) between applications and Web services on the Internet.

data-types.data-type: ATemp represents the air temperature in degree celsius.
WTemp represents the water temperature in degree celsius.
Depth represents the diving depth in meters.
HR represents the heart rate in beats per minute.
Cadence represents the cadence in revolutions per minute.

spec.title: TrackPointExtension V1
spec.desc: This schema defines Garmin extensions to be used with the GPX 1.1 schema. The root element defined by this schema is intended to be used as a child element of the "extensions" elements in the trkpt element in the GPX 1.1 schema.
